name: GoDB Tech
overview:
We are a Software firm specializing in MOBILITY SOLUTIONS. Our solutions are built over our proven Mobile Enterprise Application Platform (MEAP), powering business critical applications at many Fortune 500 companies. Our Customer’s include Intel, Cisco, Unilever, ITC, Faber Castell, Godrej Hershey, Philips, L’Oreal etc.

We have native and cross platform capabilities– Develop once and deploy it anywhere (iphone/Android/Windows/BB/Java phones).

Over the decade, we have gained the trust of more than 150 customers via a strong alliance network of 100+ partners. Simply put, this translates into 100,000+ field deployments doing more than 200 million transactions annually.

The key Strengths of our Company

• Over a decade of experience in Enterprise Mobility. • Strong expertise in Integrating Mobile apps with Enterprise Applications • Architected scalable and Secure solutions for Large customers • Domain expertise in Banking and Financial services, Manufacturers/Distributors, CPG, Retail and Logistics etc. • In-house MEAP platform on Amazon Cloud for customer deployments. • Platform expertise in Native and Cross platform tools. • Development centre in India, providing competitive cost advantage.

Please find attached a short link on our mobile expertise, http://www.go-db.com/resources/GoDBMobilityIntro.pdf

A quick recall: GoDB extends business data/processes to mobile devices, the way emails are extended on push-based mobile phones!
